      • updateWalkingState

        protected void updateWalkingState()
        Only calls updateWalkingStateNotTalking() when not talking. Otherwise walking will be set to false.
        Specified by:
        updateWalkingState in class BaseMob

      • updateWalkingStateNotTalking
